item.title: By: Kevin Archer
item.dc:creator: Kevin Archer
item.description: Hi Anita Just cooked the custard tarts Perfect.I love it when I follow a recipe as instructed and it works yours did .It is my first from your site so I intend to try a few (hard to choose)more. I do all the cooking for my wife and myself as a way to settle when I come home from my job as a builder.Next time you cook fried rice as you have stated (same as I do ) just sprinkle a chicken stock cube on top or a teaspoon of chicken powder an old lady at my Asian shop told me and it really does add something
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita
Just cooked the custard tarts Perfect.I love it when I follow a recipe as instructed and it works yours did .It is my first from your site so I intend to try a few (hard to choose)more. I do all the cooking for my wife and myself as a way to settle when I come home from my job as a builder.Next time you cook fried rice as you have stated (same as I do ) just sprinkle a chicken stock cube on top or a teaspoon of chicken powder an old lady at my Asian shop told me and it really does add something

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Thanks all!
Hi Maria - I tend to put in anything I have lying around too - not that I often have bacon lying around... but I love it so much I make sure I have some.
Hi Trisha - hehehe, not sure that I like the rice that gets stuck very much.... :P
Hope you all enjoy creating your own fried rice :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks all!

Hi Maria – I tend to put in anything I have lying around too – not that I often have bacon lying around… but I love it so much I make sure I have some.

Hi Trisha – hehehe, not sure that I like the rice that gets stuck very much…. ðŸ˜›

Hope you all enjoy creating your own fried rice ðŸ™‚

item.description: Ohhhhhh, I do love a good fried rice. I never think of making it either. Have to bookmark this!
item.content:encoded: Ohhhhhh, I do love a good fried rice. I never think of making it either. Have to bookmark this!

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: Mmmm what a sight for sore (hungry) eyes! I love fried rice so much (who doesn't?) I even scrape the hard rice that always get stuck at the bottom of the pan!
item.content:encoded: Mmmm what a sight for sore (hungry) eyes! I love fried rice so much (who doesn’t?) I even scrape the hard rice that always get stuck at the bottom of the pan!

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: One of my favorite, looks colorful!

item.title: By: Karine
item.dc:creator: Karine
item.description: I have never made fried rice. I should give it a try. Yours look gorgeous and easy to make! :)
item.content:encoded: I have never made fried rice. I should give it a try. Yours look gorgeous and easy to make! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Ooh I love a good fried rice and this one looks great! I love doing the egg like that and I also like using Lup Cheong :)
item.content:encoded: Ooh I love a good fried rice and this one looks great! I love doing the egg like that and I also like using Lup Cheong ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: I thought I was the only person to put bacon in their fried rice. I must admit though, I put anything that is in my fridge at the time into my rice. Not exactly the best fried rice, but it fills my tummy while emptying my fridge at the same time!
item.content:encoded: I thought I was the only person to put bacon in their fried rice. I must admit though, I put anything that is in my fridge at the time into my rice. Not exactly the best fried rice, but it fills my tummy while emptying my fridge at the same time!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I can almost smell the mushrooms and bacon frying - it looks very tempting!
item.content:encoded: I can almost smell the mushrooms and bacon frying – it looks very tempting!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I like that fried rice still tastes good when re-heated. Sometimes it even tastes better.
item.content:encoded: I like that fried rice still tastes good when re-heated. Sometimes it even tastes better.
